scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Coronation of the Virgin Mary. Christ, seated on a throne and holding a golden orb, blesses the kneeling Virgin Mary. Above them, an angel descends, holding a golden crown to place upon Mary's head. Four attendant virgins, with hands clasped in prayer, stand behind Mary, looking upwards. The background features a starry blue sky and architectural elements suggesting a celestial or heavenly setting, with ornate golden structures and drapery.
